alert.note: Alert for Rock; Walworth (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 23 at 1:34AM CDT by NWS Milwaukee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Walworth and southeastern Rock Counties through 215 AM CDT... At 134 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Clinton, or near Janesville, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Janesville, Elkhorn, Delavan, Williams Bay, Walworth, Clinton, Fontana-On-Geneva Lake, Sharon, Darien, Como, Richmond, Tiffany, Abells Corners, Tibbets, Allens Grove, Millard, Avalon, Shopiere, Emerald Grove and Johnstown Center. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
